main: void updateArray(int array[], int size, int operations[][3], int numOps) {
&tab1;int prefixSum[size + 1] = {0};
&tab1;while (numOps--) {
&tab2;int left = operations[numOps][0],
&tab3;right = operations[numOps][1],
&tab3;value = operations[numOps][2];
&tab2;prefixSum[left] += value;
&tab2;prefixSum[right + 1] -= value;
&tab1;}
&tab1;array[0] += prefixSum[0];
&tab1;for (int i = 1; i < size; i++) {
&tab2;prefixSum[i] += prefixSum[i - 1];
&tab2;array[i] += prefixSum[i];
&tab1;}
}

main: function updateArray(array, operations) {
&tab1;const prefixSum = new Array(array.length + 1).fill(0);
&tab1;for (const [left, right, value] of operations) {
&tab2;prefixSum[left] += value;
&tab2;prefixSum[right + 1] -= value;
&tab1;}
&tab1;array[0] += prefixSum[0];
&tab1;for (let i = 1; i < array.length; i++) {
&tab2;prefixSum[i] += prefixSum[i - 1];
&tab2;array[i] += prefixSum[i];
&tab1;}
}

main: const int MAX_COL = 100;
&empty-line;
void updateArray(int array[][MAX_COL], int rows, int cols, int operations[][5], int numOps) {
&tab1;rows += 2; cols += 2;
&tab1;int prefixSum[rows][cols] = {0};
&tab1;for (int i = 1; i < rows; i++)
&tab2;for (int j = 1; j < cols; j++) prefixSum[i][j] = 0;
&tab1;while (numOps--) {
&tab2;int x = operations[numOps][0] + 1,
&tab3;y = operations[numOps][1] + 1,
&tab3;xx = operations[numOps][2] + 2,
&tab3;yy = operations[numOps][3] + 2,
&tab3;value = operations[numOps][4];
&tab2;prefixSum[x][y] += value;
&tab2;prefixSum[xx][y] -= value;
&tab2;prefixSum[x][yy] -= value;
&tab2;prefixSum[xx][yy] += value;
&tab1;}
&tab1;--rows; --cols;
&tab1;for (int i = 1; i < rows; i++)
&tab2;for (int j = 1; j < cols; j++) {
&tab3;prefixSum[i][j] += prefixSum[i - 1][j] + prefixSum[i][j - 1] - prefixSum[i - 1][j - 1];
&tab3;array[i - 1][j - 1] += prefixSum[i][j];
&tab2;}
}

int numOps = 2;

main: function updateArray(array, operations) {
&tab1;let rows = array.length + 2,
&tab2;cols = array[0].length + 2;
&tab1;const prefixSum = Array.from({length: rows}, () => new Array(cols).fill(0));
&tab1;for (let [x, y, xx, yy, value] of operations) {
&tab2;++x; ++y; xx += 2; yy += 2;
&tab2;prefixSum[x][y] += value;
&tab2;prefixSum[xx][y] -= value;
&tab2;prefixSum[x][yy] -= value;
&tab2;prefixSum[xx][yy] += value;
&tab1;}
&tab1;--rows; --cols;
&tab1;for (let i = 1; i < rows; i++)
&tab2;for (let j = 1; j < cols; j++) {
&tab3;prefixSum[i][j] += prefixSum[i - 1][j] + prefixSum[i][j - 1] - prefixSum[i - 1][j - 1];
&tab3;array[i - 1][j - 1] += prefixSum[i][j];
&tab2;}
}
usage: const array = [
&tab1;[1, 2, 4, 1],
&tab1;[-2, 3, 6, 7],
&tab1;[1, 1, 6, 9]
];
const operations = [
&tab1;[0, 0, 1, 1, 2],
&tab1;[1, 0, 2, 3, -1]
];
updateArray(array, operations);
